abstract: The Justice Department on Friday approved InBev‘s acquisition of Anheuser-Busch, after the Belgian beer giant agreed to sell off its Labatt operations in the United States to gain antitrust approval.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department on Friday approved InBev‘s acquisition of Anheuser-Busch, after the Belgian beer giant agreed to sell off its Labatt operations in the United States to gain antitrust approval.

headline.main: InBev to Sell Labatt as Part of Anheuser Deal
